p: The dried leaves were crushed and submitted to a hydrodistillation system in a modified Clevenger type apparatus. Three hundred (300) grams of the sample were placed in a 5.0 L glass flask along with 2.0 L of distilled water and heated to boiling for 3 h [ 32]. The oil was collected using a glass Pasteur pipette, after which the yield was calculated. The obtained essential oil was treated with anhydrous sodium sulphate (Na 2SO 4) and stored at −4 °C until the chemical analyzes were carried out. The essential oil showed a yield of 0.19%.
